greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle where T(n,k) is the number of unlabeled series-reduced rooted trees with n leaves in which every leaf is at height k, (n>=1, min(1,n-1) <= k <= log_2(n)).
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1154 (rows 1..200)
program: T(n)={my(u=vector(n), v=vector(n), h=1); u[1]=1; while(u, v+=u*h; h*=x; u=EulerT(u)-u); v[1]=x; [Vecrev(p/x) | p<-v]}
xref: Row sums are A120803. Second column is A083751. A regular version is A320179.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Oct 07 2018
ext: Terms a(36) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 09 2020
